casebody.data:
Banning et al., Appellees, v. Lake County et al.; Baster, Appellant.

[Cite as Banning v. Lake Cty. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 206.]

(No. 00-1183 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.)

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. *207Weston, Hurd, Fallon, Paisley & Howley, L.L.P., Hilary S. Taylor and Gary A. Vick, Jr., for appellant.
